member.summary: 不自动调整 do not auto adjust

member.name: F:AntDesign.TriggerBoundaryAdjustMode.InView
member.summary: 在可视范围内（默认模式） The default, the viewport boundaries are the boundaries that are used for calculation if overlay is fully visible. Attempt to fit the overlay so it is always fully visible in the viewport. So if the overlay is outside of the viewport ("overflows"), then reposition calculation is going to be attempted.

member.name: F:AntDesign.TriggerBoundaryAdjustMode.InScroll
member.summary: 在滚动范围内 The document boundaries are the boundaries used for calculation if overlay needs to be reposition. So even if the overlay is outside of the viewport, the overlay may still be shown as long as it does not "overflow" the document boundaries.

member.name: T:AntDesign.Core.HashCodes.HashCodeProvider
member.summary:
HashCode provider
It is used to calculate the parameter value of HashCode
The collection type computes the HashCode for each element, and the other types simply return the value raised by the default GetHashCode method of the object
For the consideration of reflection performance, the complex model will not disassemble and calculate the HashCode of its attributes, so it is suggested that the model rewrite the GetHashCode method by itself

member.name: M:AntDesign.Core.Helpers.MemberPath.PathHelper.GetDelegate(System.String,System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Get a get value delegate, the type of the delegate depends on and :
'Func<TItem, TValue>': = typeof(TItem), = typeof(TValue), = false.
'Func<object, TValue>': = typeof(object), = typeof(TValue), = false.
'Func<object, object>': = typeof(object), = typeof(object), = false.
'Func<TItem, TValue?>': = typeof(TItem), = typeof(TValue), = true.
'Func<object, TValue?>': = typeof(object), = typeof(TValue), = true.
'Func<object, object?>': = typeof(object), = typeof(object), = true.
member.param: If you want to pass in the item as an object, set it to true
If you want to get the value as an object, set it to true

If true, the delegate will check the path is not null and return value or default value, if the type of return value is ValueType, the delegate will return Nullable<T>, if false, the delegate will not check the path not null, so that if the path contains null value or key not found, it will throw exception

member.name: M:AntDesign.Core.Helpers.MemberPath.PathHelper.GetLambda(System.String,System.Type,System.Type,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Get a get value lambda expression, the type of the lambda expression depends on and :
'Expression<Func<TItem, TValue>>': = typeof(TItem), = typeof(TValue), = false.
'Expression<Func<object, TValue>>': = typeof(object), = typeof(TValue), = false.
'Expression<Func<object, object>>': = typeof(object), = typeof(object), = false.
'Expression<Func<TItem, TValue?>>': = typeof(TItem), = typeof(TValue), = true.
'Expression<Func<object, TValue?>>': = typeof(object), = typeof(TValue), = true.
'Expression<Func<object, object?>>': = typeof(object), = typeof(object), = true.
member.param: If you want to pass in the item as an object, set it to true
If you want to get the value as an object, set it to true

If true, the delegate will check the path is not null and return value or default value, if the type of return value is ValueType, the delegate will return Nullable<T>, if false, the delegate will not check the path not null, so that if the path contains null value or key not found, it will throw exception

member.summary: Get the get value expression

member.name: M:AntDesign.DateHelper.GetNextStartDateOfDecade(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
for example, when currentDateTime is 2020-01-04 05:34:55 then: the next date shouble be 2030-01-01 00:00:00, it's the start date of next 10 years
when currentDateTime is 2023-01-04 05:34:55 then: the next date shouble be 2030-01-01 00:00:00, it's the start date of next 10 years
when currentDateTime is 2018-01-04 05:34:55 then: the next date shouble be 2020-01-01 00:00:00, it's the start date of next 10 years

member.name: M:AntDesign.DropdownButton.OnAfterRenderAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Force overlay trigger to be attached to wrapping element of the right button. Right button has to be wrapped, because overlay will be looking for first child element of the overlay trigger to calculate the overlay position. If the right button was the trigger, then its first child would be the icon/ellipsis and the overlay would have been rendered too high.
